select * from (select pid.indica_deta_id as indica_deta_id, l.prdt_id as prdt_id, p.prdt_nm as prdt_nm, pid.qy as qy, pid.line_id as line_id, pid.ord as ord, f_com_code_to_nm(pi.fg) as fg, pid.remk as remk, pid.indica_dt as indica_dt from prod_indica_deta pid join line l on pid.line_id = l.line_id join prdt p on l.prdt_id = p.prdt_id join prod_indica pi on pid.indica_id = pi.indica_id group by pid.indica_deta_id, l.prdt_id, p.prdt_nm, pid.qy, pid.line_id, pid.ord, pid.remk, pi.fg, pid.indica_dt
UNION
select pid.indica_deta_id as indica_deta_id, l.prdt_id as prdt_id, r.nm as prdt_nm, pid.qy as qy, pid.line_id as line_id, pid.ord as ord, f_com_code_to_nm(pi.fg) as fg, pid.remk as remk, pid.indica_dt as indica_dt from prod_indica_deta pid join line l on pid.line_id = l.line_id join rwmatr r on l.prdt_id = r.rwmatr_id join prod_indica pi on pid.indica_id = pi.indica_id group by pid.indica_deta_id, l.prdt_id, r.nm, pid.qy, pid.line_id, pid.ord, pid.remk, pi.fg, pid.indica_dt)
F_COM_NM_TO_CODE(fg) = #{fg}
and trunc(indica_dt) >= to_date(#{startD})
and trunc(indica_dt) <= to_date(#{endD})
order by indica_deta_id , ord
